message: Completed comprehensive extraction of all 10 personality disorders from PDF. Created detailed markdown with: (1) All 3 clusters with specific disorders, (2) Core features with concrete observable behaviors, (3) Interpersonal/cognitive/emotional patterns for each, (4) Clinical examples from PDF, (5) Celebrity examples, (6) Key distinguishing features between similar disorders, (7) Question-writing guidance focusing on tricky distinctions (OCPD vs OCD, avoidant vs schizoid, borderline vs histrionic, etc.)

key_distinctions_documented: Avoidant vs Schizoid (wants connection vs no desire)
Borderline vs Histrionic (deep vs shallow emotions)
Borderline vs Bipolar (reactive hours vs episodic weeks)
Schizotypal vs Schizophrenia (ideas of reference vs delusions)
